profile.bio: Airbnb is a community based on connection and belonging. Every day, hosts offer unique stays, experiences and services that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.

posts.content:
â€œThe world is just endlessly interesting.â€ â€” Hiroki Asai , Airbnb Chief Experience Officer

Airbnb has long believed that creativity and design can profoundly shape how people connect and experience the world. On the latest episode of COOL HUNTING 's Design Tangents, Hiroki joins hosts Josh Rubin and Evan Orensten at our San Francisco HQ to share how that philosophy guides everything we do. Watch the episode here: https://lnkd.in/e9RX43dZ â€¦more
Whatâ€™s one piece of advice every new Airbnb employee should hear? Guillaume Golsong's answer came after an unforgettable moment with CEO Brian Chesky . ðŸŽ¥ Watch now. â€¦more

Our hearts are with everyone affected by Hurricane Melissa. To support those impacted, Airbnb.org is currently providing free, emergency housing to first responders. Theyâ€™re also working with local nonprofit partners and government officials to offer additional housing support to displaced people once the storm passes and damage has been assessed. Stays are completely free for guests and are funded by donations to Airbnb.org and the generosity of Airbnb hosts. Stay updated and learn how to get involved here: https://lnkd.in/gZqHF6ra

Today we launched 65 new features based on feedback from our community. Now in the app, youâ€™ll find new social tools for guest-to-guest connections, smarter search and improved maps, more flexible payments, and AI-powered support. Read more: https://lnkd.in/eX7mCJV6 â€˜I want it to be a communityâ€™: Brian Chesky on Airbnbâ€™s AI and social reinvention fastcompany.com

"The problem with politicsâ€”I donâ€™t have a better system, but itâ€™s 50-plus-one. You have to divide them and get plus one. And it is inherently a divisive thing, and Airbnbâ€™s mission is inherently unifying. Do you know the number of Trump supporters who stayed in a house of a Kamala Harris supporter over the course of the election? Millions. Do you know the number of Democrats, Republicans that live together and donâ€™t even know theyâ€™re Democrats and Republicans? When you travel, itâ€™s one of the few times in your life that youâ€™re truly open-minded.â€ - Brian Chesky Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky on the difference between a business decision and a principle decision fastcompany.com

Across Japanâ€™s countryside, approximately 9 million homes sit quietly, steeped in history but standing empty. By 2033, one in three rural homes could be vacant. To help change that, we launched the Akiya Design Project with the Japan Kominka Association and cultural icons Kiko Mizuhara and Rola. Together, we restored traditional kominka homes in Kyoto and Ibaraki, transforming them into spaces where travelers can experience authentic Japanese culture firsthand. This project isnâ€™t just about beautiful design. It's about reviving rural tourism, preserving cultural heritage, and supporting local communities. These kominka may be off the beaten path, but their deep history and sense of place make them destinations in their own right. A reminder that sometimes, the most meaningful travel experiences lie far from the familiar.

Next yearâ€™s FIFA World Cup 26â„¢ will bring 104 matches, 48 nations, and 16 host cities. But the real story is what it means for the people and neighborhoods that make the worldâ€™s game possible. Thatâ€™s why this week in Brooklyn, we joined FIFA World Cup 26â„¢ New York New Jersey , Olympic champion Carli Lloyd , and local leaders to announce Airbnbâ€™s $1M+ community investment across New York and New Jersey.

Weâ€™re rolling out a new water safety feature to help guests feel more confident and prepared ðŸŒŠðŸ›Ÿ The feature detects when a booking includes water amenities and then: ðŸ’§ Shares in-app water safety tips ðŸ’¬ Suggests smart questions to ask the host ðŸ“± Adds helpful info to the reservation details page ðŸ“¨ Prompts important conversations right in the messaging thread All designed to support safe, informed travel decisions before check-in. https://lnkd.in/eK-Syqnt

themes: Design and creativity in travel experiences
Innovation and technology for improved user experience
Cultural preservation and promotion of authentic travel
corePillars: Creating community and belonging through travel
Empowering hosts and guests through innovative technology
Supporting communities and preserving cultural heritage
Providing unique and authentic travel experiences

colors: Not explicitly mentioned in the text but often uses warm, inviting colors
visual_identity.style: Clean, modern, and approachable, with a focus on showcasing unique homes and experiences. Focuses on photography and videography of real people and places.

best_content_types: Updates on new features and initiatives
Content highlighting social impact and community support

marketShare.note: Estimate, Airbnb is dominant but fragmented market.

strategicInsights.title: Showcase Authentic Guest Experiences
strategicInsights.description: Current format/cadence: Text-heavy posts with limited visuals, low engagement -> Category winners: UGC-driven content and authentic travel stories are highly engaging, showcasing real experiences over polished marketing. -> Primary competitors: Vrbo/Booking.com leverage user reviews and photos prominently, building trust and social proof. Secondary competitors: Travel influencers and bloggers gain traction with raw, unfiltered travel content. -> Engagement move: Launch a campaign encouraging guests to share their Airbnb experiences with photos/videos, offering incentives for the best submissions. Repost top UGC content daily, aiming for a +40% increase in saves and shares due to increased authenticity.

strategicInsights.title: Boost Host-Focused Video Content
strategicInsights.description: Current format/cadence: Limited video content, primarily featuring Airbnb executives or promotional material. -> Category winners: 'Day in the life' style videos featuring hosts, property tours, and tips are popular, fostering community and trust. -> Primary competitors: Vrbo offers host onboarding videos and guides. Secondary competitors: Real estate channels and home design influencers create engaging property-related video content. -> Engagement move: Produce a series of short (60-90 second) Reels and TikToks featuring diverse hosts and unique properties. Aim for a 3x/week posting cadence. Include interactive elements like polls and Q&As in the comments to boost engagement and increase shares by +50% within the first month.

strategicInsights.title: Amplify Community Impact Stories
strategicInsights.description: Current format/cadence: Occasional mentions of Airbnb.org. -> Category winners: Brands that genuinely showcase their positive social impact resonate with audiences. -> Primary competitors: Booking.com highlights its sustainability initiatives. Secondary competitors: B Corporations gain trust through verified social responsibility. -> Engagement move: Create a monthly 'Community Spotlight' series, featuring stories of how Airbnb hosts and guests are making a positive impact (e.g., supporting local businesses, promoting cultural exchange, or providing emergency housing). Use carousel posts with compelling visuals and data points to illustrate the impact. Aim for a +20% increase in comments focused on positive community impact and an increase in shares/saves due to alignment with user values.

competitorIntelligence.name: Booking
competitorIntelligence.theirAdvantage: Large supply and paid acquisition scale
competitorIntelligence.yourOpportunity: Differentiate via verified stays, host quality, and local storytelling

competitorIntelligence.yourOpportunity: Differentiate via verified stays, host quality, and local storytelling

competitorIntelligence.yourOpportunity: Differentiate via verified stays, host quality, and local storytelling

competitorIntelligence.name: Booking.com
competitorIntelligence.yourOpportunity: Focus on unique experiences and personalized service to differentiate.

competitorIntelligence.name: Vrbo
competitorIntelligence.theirAdvantage: Caters to large groups/families, focusing on vacation homes.
competitorIntelligence.yourOpportunity: Expand offerings to include curated experiences alongside vacation rental options.
